item.description:
Sorry for changing the date again. Promise it is final. Finally have an awesome location thanks for Brennan White and the folks at Pandemic Labs!!!!

Are you a blogger, content creator, or do you have a passion you love to share? Membership sites are an emerging trend in monetizing blogs. There are Millions of blogs online and the unfortunate fact is that 86% of sites will never make more than $100.

This meetup will discuss how you can use a membership site to sell access to premium content, build a legitimate business, and maximize all traffic to your site.

Stop giving your traffic away to google adsense or other ad networks for pennies per click. Start converting traffic to your own premium membership site for $10, $40, or $100 or more a month.

This meetup will explain:
- Why membership sites are popular with bloggers
- How you create a membership site
- What elements matter when creating a membership site
- How to set up recurring billing
- The technology behind membership site tools

Join us for an engaging presentation and discussion about how you can create your own membership site.
item.how_to_find_us: (less than a block from red/orange lines and less than 3 blocks from green/blue).

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: Membership Sites as a Business Model
